item.title: US Stocks Picked
item.description: KOS (Kosmos Energy Ltd.) Small Kosmos Energy shows promising potential with its strong asset portfolio and sustainable exploration program, but may face risks due to potential contract revisits by the Senegalese government. GERN (Geron Corporation) Small Geron Corporation shows potential for growth with positive regulatory backing and upcoming investor conferences, but investors should be mindful of the risks associated with stock offerings and regulatory delays.
